articles.title: ESA astronaut makes history with 1st TikTok from space station - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
Washington, May 10 (IANS): The European Space Agency (ESA) astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti has become the first-ever TikToker to post a video from the International Space Station.
Cristoforetti is part of SpaceX's Crew-4 mission, which arrived at the orbiti…

articles.title: Macron floats European ‘community’ open to Ukraine and UK - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: French president’s new plan is big on vision, short on detail.
articles.content: French President Emmanuel Macron used a speech on Europe Day to put forward a sweeping, avant-garde but detail-light proposal to redraw the political map of the Continent with a new organization that… [+6747 chars]

articles.title: NASA's SpaceX Crew-3 to Discuss Mission After Returning to Earth - NASA
articles.description: Astronauts of NASA’s SpaceX Crew-3 mission, including crew members from NASA and ESA (European Space Agency), will answer questions about their recent mission aboard the International Space Station during a post-splashdown news conference at 11:45 a.m. EDT We…
